custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM WikiPage WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (nodeId = ?) AND (createDate [$CREATE_DATE_COMPARATOR$] ?) AND (head = ?) AND (status = ?)
SELECT {WikiPage.*} FROM WikiPage WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (nodeId = ?) AND (createDate [$CREATE_DATE_COMPARATOR$] ?) AND (head = ?) AND (status = ?) ORDER BY createDate DESC
SELECT {WikiPage.*} FROM WikiPage LEFT JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = WikiPage.resourcePrimKey) WHERE (AssetEntry.classPK IS NULL)
